==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|とう|らい|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=とうらい}} compound {{m|zh|到來|tr=taw<sup>H</sup> loj|lit=to arrive + to come}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''dàolái'', {{etyl|yue|-}} ''dou<sup>3</sup> lei<sup>4</sup>'', {{etyl|hak|-}} ''to-lòi''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|とうらい|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|とうらい|hhira=たうらい|shin=到来}}

# {{kyujitai spelling of|到来|lang=ja}}: [[arrival]]
# {{kyujitai spelling of|到来|lang=ja}}: [[beginning]], [[start]]
#: {{ja-usex|混亂期の'''到來'''|こんらん-き の '''とうらい'''|the '''beginning''' of a chaotic period}}

====Antonyms====
* {{sense|beginning}} {{ja-r|終結|しゅうけつ}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|とうらい|hhira=たうらい|shin=[[到来]][[する]]}}

# {{kyujitai spelling of|到来|lang=ja}}: to [[arrive]]
# {{kyujitai spelling of|到来|lang=ja}}: to [[begin]], to [[start]]
#: {{ja-usex|登山の時期が'''到來'''した。|とざん の じき が '''とうらい''' した。|The season of mountain climbing has '''begun'''.}}
